alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 4:17AM AKST until January 27 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1000 Feet. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All elevations will start out as snow but Skagway is expected to change over to rain Friday afternoon or evening. Snow levels expected to rise up to 2000 feet by Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
